Admin Panel/floating-text.title: Floating Text System
Admin Panel/floating-text.description: The Floating Text System lets you create and manage floating texts and scoreboards within your Minecraft world. You can place custom texts or live scoreboards that display information like player scores in any dimension.

Admin Panel/ranks.title: Ranks System
Admin Panel/ranks.description: The Ranks System allows you to manage ranks for players, including assigning, editing, and removing ranks, as well as customizing rank colors. Ranks can also be displayed in chat, making it easy to identify roles and player hierarchy.

Admin Panel/Server-Shutdown.title: Server Shutdown
Admin Panel/Server-Shutdown.description: This guide helps you use the Server Shutdown System, which manages server shutdowns, bypasses, and kick messages. Customize who gets bypassed from shutdowns and edit the server kick message through simple in-game menus.

Admin Panel/sidebar-creator.title: Sidebar Creator
Admin Panel/sidebar-creator.description: The Sidebar Creator lets you personalize your Minecraft sidebar, displaying information like your objectives, rank, coordinates, and more. This guide explains each feature and how you can set it up to fit your preferences.

Admin Panel/spawn-protection.title: Spawn Protection System
Admin Panel/spawn-protection.description: The Spawn Protection System provides a safe zone around spawn, where players and mobs are managed to ensure a peaceful experience. Admins can control the spawn radius, effects, and whether hostile mobs are killed in this area through an Admin Panel.
